div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItemDefinition|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ChargeItemDefinition` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `ChargeItemDefinition`. Element `ChargeItemDefinition` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.meta`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.implicitRules`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.language`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.text`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.contained`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.url` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.url`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.identifier`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.version` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.version`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.versionAlgorithm[x]` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.name` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.title` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.title`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.derivedFromUri` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.derivedFromUri`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.partOf` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.partOf`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.replaces` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.replaces`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.status`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.experimental` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.experimental`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.date` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.date`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.publisher` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.publisher`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.contact` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.contact`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.description` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.description`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.useContext` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.useContext`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.jurisdiction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.jurisdiction`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.purpose` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.copyright` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.copyright`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.copyrightLabel` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.approvalDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.approvalDate`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.lastReviewDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.lastReviewDate`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.code`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ChargeItemDefinition.instance` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `ChargeItemDefinition.instance` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.instance`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.condition` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.condition` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.effectivePeriod` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.effectivePeriod` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.relatedArtifact` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability` requires a component extension (e.g., if this element is used as a content reference). Element `ChargeItemDefinition.applicability.relatedArtifact` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability.condition` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability.effectivePeriod` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.

Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability.relatedArtifact` is will have a context of ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.applicability based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ChargeItemDefinition`.
Element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ChargeItemDefinition.propertyGroup.priceComponent`.
